languages.text: Вскоре разведчики вернулись к кораблю — на сей раз им удалось найти нечто, заслуживающее внимания Лорд-капитана.
The scouts soon return to the ship — this time they have managed to find something worthy of the Lord Captain's attention.
languages.original_text: Вскоре разведчики вернулись к кораблю — на сей раз им удалось найти нечто, заслуживающее внимания Лорд-капитана.

traits.locale_text: The scouts soon return to the ship — this time they have managed to find something worthy of the Lord Captain's attention.
The scouts soon return to the ship — this time they have managed to find something worthy of the Lord Captain's attention.
The scouts soon return to the ship — this time they have managed to find something worthy of the Lord Captain's attention.
The scouts soon return to the ship — this time they have managed to find something worthy of the Lord Captain's attention.

languages.text: 侦察兵很快回到了船上。这一次，他们成功地发现了值得舰长大人注意的东西。
languages.original_text: The scouts soon return to the ship — this time they have managed to find something worthy of the Lord Captain's attention.

traits.locale_text: 侦察兵很快回到了船上。这一次，他们成功地发现了值得舰长大人注意的东西。

languages.text: 偵察部隊がすぐに船へ戻ってくる。今回はロード・キャプテンの注目を要する事態だと判断したらしい。
languages.original_text: The scouts soon return to the ship — this time they have managed to find something worthy of the Lord Captain's attention.

traits.locale_text: 偵察部隊がすぐに船へ戻ってくる。今回はロード・キャプテンの注目を要する事態だと判断したらしい。

languages.text: Los exploradores no tardan en regresar al barco. Esta vez han conseguido encontrar algo digno de la atención {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán.
languages.original_text: The scouts soon return to the ship — this time they have managed to find something worthy of the Lord Captain's attention.

traits.locale_text: Los exploradores no tardan en regresar al barco. Esta vez han conseguido encontrar algo digno de la atención {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán.

languages.text: Peu après, les éclaireurs reviennent au vaisseau après avoir fait une découverte susceptible de mériter l'attention {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.
languages.original_text: The scouts soon return to the ship — this time they have managed to find something worthy of the Lord Captain's attention.

traits.locale_text: Peu après, les éclaireurs reviennent au vaisseau après avoir fait une découverte susceptible de mériter l'attention {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}.

languages.text: Die Späher kehren schon bald zum Schiff zurück – diesmal haben sie etwas gefunden, das der Aufmerksamkeit des Lord Captain würdig ist.
languages.original_text: The scouts soon return to the ship — this time they have managed to find something worthy of the Lord Captain's attention.

traits.locale_text: Die Späher kehren schon bald zum Schiff zurück – diesmal haben sie etwas gefunden, das der Aufmerksamkeit des Lord Captain würdig ist.

languages.text: Keşif erleri, kısa süre içinde gemiye dönüyor. Bu sefer Lord Kaptan'ın ilgisine layık bir şey bulmayı başarıyorlar.
languages.original_text: The scouts soon return to the ship — this time they have managed to find something worthy of the Lord Captain's attention.

traits.locale_text: Keşif erleri kısa süre sonra gemiye döndü. Bu sefer Lord Kaptan'ın ilgisine layık bir şey bulmayı başarmışlardı.
